import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import LibraryLogo from '../assets/Library.svg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Nav({numberOfItems}) { function openMenu(){ document.body.classList += " menu--open"; } function closeMenu(){ document.body.classList.remove("menu--open"); } return (
  • Home Books
  • { numberOfItems > 0 && {numberOfItems} }
  • Home Books Cart
) }
